summary:
Software Professional in Internet/Ad-Tech industry.

I'm passionate about programming and delivering, clean, test-covered, well-designed and scalable code. I seek to learn and try to apply all of it in a way that makes life easier. I always try to design, develop and deliver technology solutions to problems around me.

I have strong hold on computer science fundamentals including Algorithms, Data structures, OOPs, Design Patterns, Operating Systems, Database Systems and Computer Networking.
helloText: Dear Visitor, Thank you for visiting my webspace.
